H0.text: In which year was the battle of Rorke's Drift. 1850

H1.text: In which year was the battle of Rorke's Drift. 1875

H2.text: In which year was the battle of Rorke's Drift. 1860

H3.text: In which year was the battle of Rorke's Drift. 1879

A4.text: The successful British defence of the Swedish mission station of Rorke's Drift began once a large contingent of Zulu warriors broke off from the main force during the final hour of the British defeat at the day-long Battle of Isandlwana on 22 January 1879.

A5.text: The Roll of those present at Rorke's Drift 22/23 January, 1879

A6.text: The Anglo-Zulu War was fought from January to early July 1879.

A7.text: The exact date of the invasion was 11 January 1879.
